text.0: o muchinvoked thou hast subdued thy foemen thy might is loftiest here display thy bounty.
text.1: in thy right hand o indra bring us treasures thou art the lord of rivers filled with riches.
text.2: like a dread wild beast roaming on the mountain thou hast approached us from the farthest distance.
text.3: whetting thy bold and thy sharp blade o indra crush thou the foe and scatter those who hate us.
text.4: thou mighty indra sprangest into being as strength for lovely lordship oer the people.
text.5: thou drovest off the folk who were unfriendly and to the gods thou gavest room and freedom.
